import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import './home.css'; import banner from './banner.png' import Product from './Product'; import SmallProduct from './SmallProduct'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import Modal from 'react-awesome-modal'; class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { visible: false } } openModal() { this.setState({ visible: true }); } closeModal() { this.setState({ visible: false }); } componentDidMount() { this.openModal(); } render() { const data = this.props.todoList.data; const slideImages = [ 'https://wheelandbarrow.com.au/images/category_banner/DSC_0227.jpg', 'https://vuoncayviet.com/data/items/1149/cay-canh-lam-qua-tang-de-thuong.jpg', 'https://scontent.fsgn2-3.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/59807963_2259809167605604_8093574928227368960_o.jpg?_nc_cat=106&_nc_eui2=AeGhnUJ1E0hmiZ9uzAY4N5dRDxTLs3cUdE2y2jVC4HXKK8_uY28nYK3IPu7qebdaC48xRP0cNSkxG-8j_MVCaUMkRxBJZ6hs-yVHDmX7rr4onw&_nc_oc=AQmR45_degqH_mHvp94QVBKkhsoRzQz7zEcxg0rcp-G48w7P9wClF77XVvW0LpZ7_CJCIvwqDzW3DiRKSHkYx4x0&_nc_ht=scontent.fsgn2-3.fna&oh=f7a9405da735fe49cf6fca3f0faf11bd&oe=5D85DFFF' ]; const properties = { duration: 7000, transitionDuration: 500, infinite: true, indicators: true, arrows: true } return (
this.closeModal()} >

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { todoList: state }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(Home);
